name: wordle
description: A modern, feature-rich Wordle game with PWA capabilities, achievements, leaderboards, and social features
author: Wordle Team

scripts.test-pwa: npm run build:local && npx serve -s build -p 3000
scripts.test-pwa-gh-pages: npm run build:gh-pages && npx serve -s build -p 3000
scripts.test-pwa-lighthouse: npm run build:local && npx serve -s build -p 3000 & sleep 5 && lhci autorun --config=./.lighthouserc.json && kill %1
scripts.lighthouse: npm run build:local && npx serve -s build -p 3000 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html
